item.title: Grid-tie savings and off-grid independence – an uninterrupted power supply with $0 energy bill!
item.dc:creator: T S
item.description:
Mobile Solar recently worked with a local contractor to build a grid-interactive solar electric system with battery backup for a condo-owner in Paso Robles.  This compact system was built into a small specially built shed behind the owner’s home.  The owner now enjoys the best ...

The post Grid-tie savings and off-grid independence – an uninterrupted power supply with $0 energy bill! appeared first on Mobile Solar.
item.content:encoded:
Mobile Solar recently worked with a local contractor to build a grid-interactive solar electric system with battery backup for a condo-owner in Paso Robles.  This compact system was built into a small specially built shed behind the owner’s home.  The owner now enjoys the best of both worlds: grid-tie savings and off-grid independence – an uninterrupted power supply with $0 energy bill!

 

 

 

 

 

 

 

 

The post Grid-tie savings and off-grid independence – an uninterrupted power supply with $0 energy bill! appeared first on Mobile Solar.
